entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending early this evening then clearing. Risk of snow squalls early this evening. Local blowing snow early this evening. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 42 in the morning and minus 32 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy before morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 33 in the evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
